group_1.textRight: [chara:303301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Mayuuu!

It's me, your beloved blade-bearing@beauty, Sayuki Fumino! [chara:303301:lipSynch_0][wait:2.0][chara:303301:cheek_1][chara:303301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:motion_400][chara:303301:lipSynch_1]Cutting in!
Kamihama's famous swordsmith, Godsley,@is my hero...
And his sword exhibit opens todaaay!
Come on, Mayu!
Let's get going, okay!

group_1.textLeft: Um, the thing is...about the exhibit...
The items we're going to display haven't@arrived yet, so...
The exhibit itself isn't actually open yet.

group_1.textRight: [chara:303301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]O-OH MY GOSH!

group_1.textLeft: I'll help get it open as soon as we can!

group_1.textRight: [chara:303301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303301:cheek_1][chara:303301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:303301:lipSynch_1]I understand.
It's okay, I'll just sit tight and get even@more excited for it!
And while I wait, I'm going on a search to@find a new sword.
So I'm off to the antique store!
Yeah! See you!
Mayu, sorry to ask you this.
But could you get me some of the pamphlets@for the special exhibit?
And call the others in for me.

group_1.textLeft: (This is for all the people looking forward@to the exhibit.)
(I have to do whatever I can!)

group_1.textRight: Thanks to everyone's hard work, preparations@for the exhibit are complete.
Good job, everyone.

group_1.textLeft: It's all thanks to you, boss!
I moved around more than I have in a long@time... It made me so hungry.
I wonder what I should cook for dinner.

group_1.textRight: Dinner...
Well, you see, both my wife and daughter@have gone to my mother-in-law's house.
I'll be eating dinner alone tonight.
I can't cook myself, so I was thinking I@might eat at a restaurant.
Would you care to join me, Mayu?

group_1.textLeft: But I'm afraid I can't. I need to cook@dinner at home tonight.

group_1.textRight: Oh... Yes, of course.
My apologies for putting you on the spot.
Well, good work today.
